title: ReferenceBank
description: A class to describe an institution (party) identified by means of a coding scheme and an optional name.

referenceBankId.description: An institution (party) identifier, e.g. a bank identifier code (BIC). FpML specifies a referenceBankIdScheme.

referenceBankName.description: The name of the institution (party). A free format string. FpML does not define usage rules for the element.
